body_html:
update:
installing the libjpeg(uncertain)/libpng/libgif -dev seemed to fix this problem. I'm still unable to build, because of issues with pmul/jacobi.h, but I am following up on that in a separate issue thread. I would still be curious, when in the build process I was supposed to have installed those libraries? Or if those are just libraries that are expected to be installed on most linux builds.

body:
update:
installing the libjpeg(uncertain)/libpng/libgif -dev seemed to fix this problem. I'm still unable to build, because of issues with pmul/jacobi.h, but I am following up on that in a separate issue thread. I would still be curious, when in the build process I was supposed to have installed those libraries? Or if those are just libraries that are expected to be installed on most linux builds.
